logo.title: Favicon
logo.description: This image will serve as the workspace identifier and will display the logo in browser tabs so your clients can identify you. Preferably use a .PNG image, equal to or greater than 512 x 512 pixels.

headerImage.title: Header Image
headerImage.description: This image will be placed in the header of the workspace. Preferably use a .PNG image, equal to or greater than 68 x 276 pixels with no background.

footerImage.title: Footer Image
footerImage.description: This image will be placed in the footer of the workspace. Preferably use a .PNG image, equal to or greater than 68 x 276 pixels without background.
